turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello. I'd like to order some espresso drinks from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I feel like a two ice cappuccino with cold foam.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes the size of the drink will be a grande and I'd like to pick it up at the Starbucks on Road 64 Pasco, Washington.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 2 iced grande cappuccino with cold foam comes out to $5.60.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: should i place the order at the starbucks on road 65 in washington.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: It's Road 68 in Washington. Can you confirm?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, that's that's where it's at. Also, okay, let's make it three instead of two.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. the total for 3 iced grande cappuccino with cold foam comes out to $8.60.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i've placed the order at starbucks on road 68th.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: it'll be ready for pick up in 10 mins.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope. I'll head out in 5 minutes. Thank you.
